name: Hexaguessimal
description:
** Having trouble playing on mobile?  Try playing the game here. See if you can the background color of of this page in 6 tries! 
The catch? Your guesses are in hexadecimal.

Need some help getting started? Here is a good article on how hexadecimals work, and you may also try using a color picker to help you along.

Special thanks to: Mackenzie Ito, Alex Pait, and the Eggplant Discord Community for helping me along and keeping me motivated <3
